content: Who will tell whether one happy moment of love, or the joy of breathing or walking on a bright morning and smelling the fresh air, is not worth all the suffering and effort which life implies?
translations: ita:Chi dir√† che un momento d'amore o la gioia del respirare o del passeggiare in una mattinata luminosa e respirare l'aria
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by unknown (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
